Title: By Perjury
Plot: The murder of the plaintiff in a high-profile lawsuit against a major airline leads detectives to a defense attorney (Dallas Roberts) who is willing to do whatever it takes to ensure his big payday.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Harriett D. Foy, Adam Mastrelli, Dallas Roberts, Mercedes Ruehl
